LESS information

With our permanent makeup training course, you will receive:

A kit of innovative brand equipment and tools.

Proprietary skills in procedure application on live models, along with client communication and business skills from the top GGB trainer.

Ongoing support and video training tutorials.

A certificate of completion.

A chance to become a Top Artist and Trainer at GGB Academy.
